about_the_game:
The Starter pack is an incredible deal to unlock a lot of characters quickly in a price friendly way.

Unlock 8 of the first characters added to the game to add diversity to your strategies of survival.

This Starter Pack unlocks:
  • Hyunwoo
  • Magnus
  • Fiora
  • Nadine
  • Zahir
  • Isol
  • Li Dailin
  • Jackie
*This pack does not include Hart
**Note: If you have previously purchased any of the characters included in this pack before buying it, you will receive the cost of those characters as A-coin. Check your mailbox to receive the A-coins

How to receive:

  • In the game go to the menu: STORE
  • Select tab: DLC
  • Click on the button: GET REWARD
  • You will receive the characters after that

Hyunwoo:

Show them what your fists are for! Get up close and personal and beat down your enemies with the Highschool Heavyweight.

Magnus:

The Motorcycle Menace brings his bike to the island, and isn't afraid to run down anyone in his way.

Fiora:

Take a stab at victory with the Graceful Fencer. Talent with rapiers, swords, and spears makes Fiora a formidable foe.

Nadine:

Raised by wolves, the Wild Huntress knows a thing or two on how to survive - especially on Lumia Island.

Zahir:

Become Godlike as the Ascended Disciple and show your enemy their reckoning has arrived.

Isol:

Watch your step. The Guerrilla controls the battlefield with explosives and traps, surly to make anyone regret stepping on them.

Li Dailin:

The Spirited Master is just that - a master of martial arts. Once she takes a few drinks, she's even more to handle.

Jackie:

One of the earliest subjects of the experiment, the Serial Killer Jackie has her chainsaw fueled up and is ready hack and slash her way through her victims.

name: Eternal Return Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225, AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 640, ATI Radeon HD 7700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K , AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB . AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Installing the game on an SSD improves loading times.

short_description: The Eternal Return Starter pack allows you to try many characters, and find out which character you feel most comfortable playing with.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Korean*, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Russian, Thai, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
